mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Tyler, John, 1790-1862
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Suggests that his supports and friends in N.Y. be encouraged to purchase a subscription to a weekly paper, the Old Dominion, at two dollars per year, or a daily paper the New Era, at five dollars per year to boost sales and support the editor; both papers, published and edited by Wm. Cunningham, in Portsmouth, Va., provide extensive coverage and support for him [JT]. Autograph Letter Signed
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, 1846 March 17, John Tyler, Sherwood Forest to Alexander Gardiner, New York, N.Y.
